2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:15): Heard about the EDPS suggestion for webbrowser builders?
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:16): EDPS is the European privacy watchdog
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:16): they want that browser vendors by default refuse cookies from advertising networks
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:16): http://www.edps.europa.eu/EDPSWEB/webdav/site/mySite/shared/Documents/Consultation/Opinions/2010/10-03-19_Trust_Information_Society_EN.pdf
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:17): See page 17 onward

a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (15:17): "Validation can then be used as a quick check to determine whether the code is the clean work of a seasoned HTML author, or quickly hacked-together tag soup."

2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:18): The steps that users must take to opt-out seem not only complicated but also excessive (first he must set his browser to accept cookies, then exercise the opt-out option).

2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:19): Therefore, while legally speaking, Article 5(3) of the ePrivacy Directive provides for effective legal protection, in practice, Internet users are deemed to consent to be monitored for the purposes of sending behavioural advertisement when in fact, in many, if not most cases, they are fully unaware that the monitoring takes place.

2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:19): As described above, web browsers commonly allow a level of control over certain kinds of cookies. Currently, the default settings of most web browsers are accepting all cookies. In other words, by default, the browsers are set to accept all cookies, independently of the purpose of the cookie.
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:20): [...] Furthermore, there is no privacy wizard on the first install or update of browser applications.
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:20): Looks like they're urging on legislation as well.
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:21): Which would mean that browsers in the EU would have to refuse 3rd party cookies by default
2466054b396284f05e6f6e4e7d3c806d (15:21): and implement a privacy wizard
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (15:21): I wonder if they know about SharedObjects
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (15:22): "Currently, the default settings of most web browsers are accepting all cookies."
